movement.violin: \relative e' { \cueDuring #"pianoUpMovementI" #UP R1*4 | \cueDuring #"pianoUpMovementI" #DOWN R1 | e2.\p( g4-1) | b2. b4\upbow | e4( g) fis e | e2( dis\<) | %% 10 r4\! dis->\upbow e-> fis-> | a,2.\open\< d8 c\! | g2\cresc( a4\open ais) | %% 13 b4( fis2) fis4\upbow | %% 14 g2.\pocoCresc fis8 e | c'2 b | d2. c8 b | f'2 e | %% 18 g4->\f\downbow fis8 e g4 fis8 e | b'4-> g-> e-> c-> | b2\dim g | %% 21 fis b | e,8\p\downbow g'-. fis-. g-. e-. g-. fis-. g-. | %% 23 e( g fis g) e( fis d e) | \repeat unfold 2 { c( e d e) } | %% 25 c( e-4 d e) c( d b c) | a c b c a b g a | fis e' d e c d b c | %% 28 ais\<( g') fis e fis g a ais | b4->\f b,-> r2 | %% 30 a'4->\downbow a,-> r2 | g'4-4->\downbow g,-1-> r2 | %% 32 fis4-2->\downbow g-> a-> \once \stemUp b-> | \time 2/4 c4-> r | %% 34 \time 4/4 c8\downbow( d) ees g ees( g) ees d | %% 35 c( ees) c b a( b c d) | \time 2/4 ees4 r | %% 37 \time 4/4 a,8--\downbow b-- c( ees) c ees c( b) | %% 38 a c a( g) fis( a fis ees) | d4\dim^\rit( c' a g) | fis( e a, b) | %% 41 d2-4( cis) | c( a) | \tempo \tranquillo g2\p\downbow( a4 b) | b2( a) | %% 45 a2( b4 c) | c2( b) | r4 b-1( d-3 g,) | a4.( b8 a2) | %% 49 r4 b-1\downbow e8\upbow( d b g) | a4.( b8) a2 | r4 e'\upbow( g a,) | e'2. a,8-- b-- | c4.\>( d16-4 c) b4 a\! | %% 54 \acciaccatura g8 g'2-1( a4 b) | b2( a) | a( b4 c) | c2( b) | %% 58 r4 b\upbow( d-4\flageolet g,) | a4.\<\downbow( b8\!) a2\> | %% 60 r4\! c-2\upbow( e a,) | b4.\downbow\<( c8) b2 | %% 62 r4\f e4\upbow g a, | r g'\upbow b cis, | r d\upbow g b, | %% 65 e2.\> a,8 b | c4.\p^\rit( d16 c) b4( a) | %% 67 \tempo \tempoPrimo g8-.\p d-. d-. g-. g-. a-. a16->( b c d) | b8-. d,-. d-. g-. g-. a-. a16->( b c d) | %% 69 b8( g') fis-- e-- dis( e fis g) | e4-> d-> c-> b-> | %% 71 / 72 \repeat percent 2 { a8-. e-. e-. a-. a-. b-. b16->( c d e-4) } | %% 73 c8( a') g-- fis-- eis-1( fis-1 g a) | b1 | %% 75 g,8\p\downbow d d g g a a16->( b c d) | %% 76 b->( c d e-4) c->( d e fis) d->( e fis g) e->( fis g a) | %% 77 / 78 \repeat percent 2 {bes4->\f bes,-> bes'-> bes,-> } | %% 79 / 80 \repeat percent 2 { b8\p <d, g,> <d g,> <b' d,> <b d,> <c d,> << {\voiceOne a16->( b c d)} \new Voice {\voiceTwo d,4} >> \oneVoice } g2.->\f b4-> | d2.-> d4 | g-> b-> a-> g-> | e-> g-> e-> d-> | b8:16-> g':16 e:16 d:16 b:16 d:16 b:16 a:16 | g: b: g: e: d: e: d: b: | g4 r <d' c' fis> r | <g, d' b' g'> r r2 \bar "|." }

\relative c'' { \cueDuring #"pianoUpMovementII" #UP {R2.} \cueDuring #"pianoUpMovementII" #DOWN {R2.*3} | c2.\p | b8( c d c b a) | c2. | b \breathe | b | a8( b c b a g) | %% 11 a2.-4 | e \breathe | e'-4 | e8\open( f g f e a,) | e'2.-4 | d \breathe | c | %% 18 a8( b c e-4 d8. c16) | c4. a8^\rit( f a) | %% 20 c4\fermata b8->\downbow\< c->\upbow d-> dis-> | %% 21 \tempo \tempoAgitato e4.-4~\mf e8 a e\open | d( c b) b( c d) | e4.-4 a,\open | %% 24 c b | e4.-4~ e8 a e\open | d( c b) b( c d) | e2.-4~ | e4 e8\open( f4 fis8) | %% 29 g4.~ g8 a-- bes-- | bes\espressivo( a g) f( e d) | %% 31 f4.~ f8 g-- aes-- | aes\espressivo( g f) e-4( d c) | e4.-4~ e8 a e\open | %% 34 d( c b) b( c d) | e4.-4\< a, | c4.\fz( b8) r r\fermata | a'4.-4\flageolet\< a,\open | %% 38 c4.\fz( b8) r r\fermata | bes2.->\fz\downbow^\stringendo | a->\fz | aes->\fz | %% 42 R\fermata | \tempo \tempoLento << {g2.~\pDolce} {s8 s s^\rit} >> | g4 f8( a,4\fermata b8) | %% 45 \tempo \tempoPrimo c2.\p | b8( c d) c( b a) | c2. | b | b | a8( b c) b( a g) | a2.~ | a | e' | e8( f g) f( e a,) | e'2. | d | a'-4 | a,8( b c) e-3\p( d8.\fermata c16) | \once \override Hairpin.to-barline = ##f c2.~\>^\moltoRit | c\pp \bar "|." }

piano.up: \relative e'' { %% 1 << {\voiceOne e2.} \new Voice {\voiceTwo a,8\f( b c) c( b a)} >> \oneVoice | << {<g e c>4. <e cis>} {s8\< s s\! s\> s s\!} >> | %% 3 << {<a d, a>2.} {s8\> s s s s s\!} >> | %% 4 << {\voiceOne d,8^\rit( e f) f( e d)} \new Voice {\voiceTwo c4. a4 b8} >> \oneVoice | %% 5 r8\p^\aTempo <c' g>8--( \repeat unfold 3 {<c g>8--} <c g>8--) | R2. | %% 7 r8 <c f,> <c f,> <c f,>4.:8 | r8 <b f> <b f> <b f>4.:8 | %% 9 r8 <b e,> <b e,> <b e,>4.:8 | R2. | r8 <a e> <a e> <a e>4.:8 | %% 12 r8 e e e4.:8 | r8 <e' a, g> <e a, g> <e a, g>4.:8 | R2. | %% 15 r8 <e a, fis> <e a, fis> <e a, fis>4.:8 | %% 16 r8 <d a fis> <d a fis> <d a fis>4.:8 | %% 17 r8 <c a f> <c a f> <c a f>4.:8 | <a fis>4.( <b f>) | %% 19 <c e,> <a f c>^\rit | <g e c>4\fermata b,8\< c-> d-> dis-> | %% 21 \tempo \tempoAgitato r4.\mf \change Staff = "down" << { r } {s8 s s\sustainOff} >> \change Staff = "up" | %% 22 -- 24 \repeat unfold 3 { r4. \change Staff = "down" <<{ r} {s8 s s\sustainOff} >> \change Staff = "up"} | %% 25 r4. \change Staff = "down" r \change Staff = "up" | %% 26 b8( d f d f b) | <e c g>2.~\< | <e c g>4 e,8( f4 fis8) | %% 29 r8\! g bes r f <bes g> | r e, <g bes> r f a | r f aes r ees <f aes> | %% 32 r d <f aes> r e g | r e( gis a e e') | r d,( a' b a d,) | %% 35 \clef "alto" r8\< e,( a \clef "violin" c e a) | <c a f>4.\fz( <b a f>8) r r\fermata | %% 37 \clef "alto" r8\< e,,( a \clef "violin" c e a) | <c a fis>4.\fz( <b a fis>8) r r\fermata | r8^\stringendo\f <bes f> <bes f> <bes f>4.:8 | r8 <a f> <a f> <a f>4.:8 | r8 <aes f> <aes f> <aes f>4.:8 | R2.\fermata | \tempo \tempoLento r8\p <g c, a> <g c, a>^\rit <g c, a>4.:8 | <g d b>8 r r r4\fermata r8 | \tempo \tempoPrimo \clef "alto" r8\p <c, g>--( \repeat unfold 3 {<c g>--} <c g>--) | R2. | r8 <c f,>--( \repeat unfold 3 {<c f,>--} <c f,>--) | r8 <b f>--( \repeat unfold 3 {<b f>--} <b f>--) | r8 <b g e>--( \repeat unfold 3 {<b g e>--} <b g e>--) | R2. \repeat percent 2 {r8 <a e> <a e> <a e>4.:8} | r8 <e' a, e> <e a, e> <e a, e>4.:8 | R2. | r8 <e a, e> <e a, e> <e a, e>4.:8 | r8 <d a d,> <d a d,> <d a d,>4.:8 | r8 <a' d, a> <a d, a> <a d, a>4.:8 | r4. <b, f>4.\p\fermata | <c e,>4.^\moltoRit\> f,8( d f) | <c' e,>16\pp g \clef "violin" {\voiceOne e' g c e e'4.\fermata} \bar "|." }
piano.down: \relative f' { %% 1 fis2. | g,8( a bes) bes( a g | f) f,( a d e f) | g4. g, | %% 5 r8 e''--( \repeat unfold 3 {e--} e--) | R2. | %% 7 \repeat percent 2 { r8 d d d4.:8 } | r8 c c c4.:8 | R2. | %% 11 r8 c c c4.:8 | r8 <c g> <c g> <c g>4.:8 | r8 cis cis cis4.:8 | R2. | %% 15 \repeat percent 3 { r8 d d d4.:8 } | <d g,>4.~ <d g,> | %% 19 <g, c,> <a f c> | <e c>4\fermata b8 c-> d-> dis-> | %% 21 \shape #'((0 . -6.6) (1 . -3) (-2 . 2) (0 . 0)) Slur a8\sustainOn( e' a \change Staff = "up" c e a) \change Staff = "down" | %% 22 \shape #'((0 . -6.6) (0 . 0) (0 . 1) (0 . 0)) Slur a,,\sustainOn( f' a \change Staff = "up" d a' b) \change Staff = "down" | %% 23 \shape #'((0 . -6.6) (0 . 0) (0 . 1) (0 . 0)) Slur a,,\sustainOn( e' a \change Staff = "up" e' a c) \change Staff = "down" | %% 24 \shape #'((0 . -6.6) (0 . 0) (0 . 1) (0 . 0)) Slur a,,\sustainOn( e' gis \change Staff = "up" d' e b') \change Staff = "down" | %% 25 \shape #'((0 . -5.5) (0 . 0) (0 . 0) (0 . 0)) Slur a,,( e' a \change Staff = "up" c e a) \change Staff = "down" | %% 26 a,,4. aes | r8 g( c e g c | e4) c8( d4 dis8) | e4. d | cis d | d c | %% 32 b c | b c | f,2. | e,8\sustainOn( a c e a c\sustainOff) | %% 36 d4.\sustainOn~ d8 r r\fermata\sustainOff | e,,8\sustainOn( a c e a c\sustainOff) | %% 38 dis4.~\sustainOn dis8 r r\fermata\sustainOff | %% 39 r8 d d d4.:8 | r8 <d c> <d c> <d c>4.:8 | r8 <d b> <d b> <d b>4.:8 | R2.\fermata | r8 <d, d,> <d d,> <d d,>4.:8 | %% 44 <g, g,>8 r r r4\fermata r8 | r8 e'--( e-- e-- e-- e--) | R2. | \repeat percent 2 {r8 d--( d-- d-- d-- d--)} | r8 c--( c-- c-- c-- c--) | R2. | r8 c c c4.:8 | r8 <c g> <c g> <c g>4.:8 | r8 <cis g> <cis g> <cis g>4.:8 | R2. | \repeat percent 2 {r8 fis, fis fis4.:8} | r8 <f f'> <f f'> <f f'>4.:8 | r4. <g g,>4.\fermata | << {\voiceOne g4. a8( f a)} \new Voice {\voiceTwo c,2.} >> \oneVoice | << {<c g'>8\sustainOn s8 s s4.\sustainOff} { s8 \change Staff = "up" \voiceTwo c''16 e g c g'4.} >> \bar "|." }

movement.violin: \relative d' { \cueDuring #"pianoUpMovementIII" #UP {R2*2} \cueDuringWithClef #"pianoUpMovementIII" #UP #"alto" {R2*4} | e8-.\p\downbow r g-.\upbow r | b2-> | %% 9 e,4\prall\downbow g\prall | b2-> | e8-.\downbow g-. e-. g-. | %% 12 e-. g-. fis-. e-. | fis8 r dis r | e2 | g,8\downbow r b\upbow r | %% 16 d2-> | g,4\prall\downbow b\prall | d2-> | g8-.\downbow b-. g-. b-. | %% 20 g b a g | fis a fis a | fis a g fis | e\cresc g e g | e g fis e | %% 25 dis\f fis b r8 | r4 r8 e,( | dis) fis b r8 | R2 | r4 b,\upbow\< | %% 30 b b \bar "||" \key c \major f'2-4\pDolce | e4( d) | a4.-3( b8) | e4( d) | %% 35 g,4.( a8) | g2 | f' | e4( d) | cis4.\<( e8) | bes'4( a) | \once \override Hairpin.to-barline = ##f d,4.\>( e8) | %% 42 d2\! | a'-4\flageolet | g4-4( f) | f( e) | dis-- e-- | f2 | e4( d) | d-3( c) | %% 50 b-- c-- | a c | e2-4 | a,8-.\downbow\< a-. c-. c-.\! | ees2 | %% 55 r4 g,\f\upbow | c e | bes' a | e g | f a, | b4.\fermata e8\upbow | %% 61 c4\p^\aTempo \tuplet 3/2 4 { g8( a g) | g( a g) e'( d c) | %% 63 \omit TupletNumber b\f( c b) a' g f | e d c b c d } | e4-4\p \tuplet 3/2 4 { e8->\open( f e) | e->( f e) c'-4( b-4 a) | gis\f( a gis) b a gis | %% 68 f e d d c b } | a4\f \tuplet 3/2 4 { <c e>8 <c e> <c e> | <b e>4.:8 <a e'>4.:8 } | r4 \tuplet 3/2 4 { <cis e>4.:8\upbow | <b e>4.:8 <ais e'>4.:8 } | b4\fz \tuplet 3/2 4 { b8->( c b) | b->( c b) g'( fis e) | fis( g fis) a\f g fis | e dis c b cis dis } \bar "||" \key g \major e8\p r g r | b2 | e,8-.\downbow e-. g-. g-. | b2 | e,8-.\downbow g-. e-. g-. | e g fis e | fis r dis r | e2 | e8\downbow r b' r | ais2-> | e8-.\downbow e-. b'-. b-. | ais2-> | b8 r \tuplet 3/2 4 { %%\revert TupletNumber.stencil g,,8\p\upbow\pocoPocoStringCresc g g | %%\omit TupletNumber b4.:8\downbow dis4.:8 | e4.:8 g:8 | b:8 dis:8 | e:8 g:8 | b:8 << {\voiceTwo dis,:8} \new CueVoice {\voiceOne dis':8^"Ossia"} >> } | << {\voiceTwo e,4\f} \new CueVoice {\voiceOne e'4} >> \oneVoice r | <dis, b'> r | <e, g,>\downbow r \bar "|." }

piano.down: \relative a' { \change Staff = "up" \voiceTwo ais8 r ais-. r | %% 2 ais-. r s4 \change Staff ="down" \oneVoice | ais,8 ais ais ais | %% 4 ais4 r | R2 | <b, b,>4\f r | e,8 r g r | b2-> | e,8 e g g | b2-> | %% 11 e'8 r d r | cis2 | c8 r b r | e,2 | g,8 r b r | d2-> | g,8 g b b | %% 18 d2-> | \repeat unfold 2 { g8-. g'-. } | g,2-> | \repeat unfold 2 { d8-. d'-. } | d,2-> | \repeat unfold 2 {c8-. c'-.} | c, c'( dis e) | <d bis> r r e,( | dis fis b) r | r4 r8 e,,( | dis-.) fis-. b-. r8\fermata | %% 30 R2*2 \bar "||" \key c \major d4 r | g, r | d' r | g, r | e'8 r g, r | %% 36 c r e r | d4 r | g, r | e' r | g r | f8 r f, r | a r d r | f2->( | %% 44 e4 d | c8) r c, r | e r g r | d'2->( | c4 b | a8) r a, r | c r e r | %% 51 a4 g | fis2 | a8--( a--) g--( g--) | fis2 | <g c e>4\arpeggio r | %% 56 R2 | <g cis e>4\arpeggio r | R2 | <g d' f>4\arpeggio r | %% 60 <g g,>\arpeggio r\fermata | c8 r e r | g4 r | g,8 r g' r | R2 | %% 65 c,8 r e r | g r r4 | e,8 r e' r | R2 | \tuplet 3/2 {a,8->( b a)} r4 | R2 | \tuplet 3/2 {ais8->( b ais)} r4 | R2 | b8 r e r | g4 r | b,8 r b' r | R2 \bar "||" e,8 e'-. dis-. d-. | cis2~ | cis8 d cis c | b2 | ais8-. b-. ais-. b-. | ais e f g | a r <f b,> r | e dis c b | \repeat percent 10 {e, b' e, b'} | e,4 r | <b' b,> r | <b e,> r \bar "|." }
